How to use this plugin?

  1. Open any website you want to visit.
  2. You should find a small widget on the bottom right of the page.
  3. Click the button to expand.
  4. Type any thing you want to ask in the input box.
  5. Click button or hit "Enter" key to send the question.
  6. Wait for the answer.
  7. Continue to ask follow-up questions as needed.
  8. Click the button to minimize the widget or click to close.

FAQs

What is the memory usage?

This usage indicate how much tokens is being used by storing current conversation before the extension perform a memory cleanup.

It is normal to see a high memory usage when you have a long conversation.

When the memory usage is high, the extension will perform a memory cleanup to free up the memory.

The extension will summarize the conversation and store the summary in the memory in order to free up memory.
